channel.title: BUhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Christie Brinkley: A Smile for the Ages

item.title: Many Colon Cancer Cases Are Preventable—6 Ways To Reduce Your Risk Today
item.description: Almost half of these cancer cases can be prevented through diet.

item.title: Brain Cells Start To Die In Your 20s: How To Keep Your Mind Sharp As You Age
item.description: Neuroscientists and psychologists share their favorite games for keeping the mind young.

item.title: Drinking This Daily Increases Liver Cancer Risk By 85% (Nope, Not Alcohol)
item.description: It's also associated with chronic liver disease, according to research.

item.title: Dryness, Fine Lines & Texture Can All Be Attributed To This
